description: Test suite for the FbCommon resolver component, which loads and verifies resolution overlays from a JSON configuration file. It writes a temporary overlay JSON, loads it into the Resolver, and verifies alias resolution and event mappings.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Class responsible for loading resolution overlays from JSON files and providing alias resolution and event mapping services.

methods.name: bool WriteTempFile(const std::string & path,const std::string & content)
methods.description: Writes content to a specified temporary file path.

methods.name: int main()
methods.description: Main function that sets up the test, loads the overlay, and verifies resolution.

methods.name: __anonbd92ba9b0102(const std::string& key, const std::string& expectedAlias, bool expectComRpc)

ctags.name: WriteTempFile
ctags.pattern: /^static bool WriteTempFile(const std::string& path, const std::string& content) {$/

ctags.name: __anonbd92ba9b0102
ctags.pattern: /^    auto checkAlias = [&](const std::string& key, const std::string& expectedAlias, bool expectC/
ctags.signature: (const std::string& key, const std::string& expectedAlias, bool expectComRpc)
